membership_company_name.description: This is the company name listed in Private Content > General Settings.

membership_domain.description: This is the domain of the private content website.

membership_registration_link.description: Link to the registration page for the private content website.

membership_website_admin.description: This is the website admin listed in Private Content > General Settings.

membership_password_saved_link.description: Link to the password saved page. The link will redirect the visitor to a random restricted page that they have access to.

membership_password_reset_link.description: Link to the reset password page for the private content website.
